info.name: Complete UI Testing Suite + 3 API Tests
info.description: UI Testing Sequential Workflow (Steps 1-8) + 3 Essential API Tests

item.name: Section 1: Create Suite & Batch Add UI + API Tests

exec: console.log('‚úÖ Test Suite Created - ID:', responseJson.data.suiteId);

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Complete UI Testing Suite + 3 API Tests",
  "description": "Sequential UI Testing (Signup‚ÜíLogin‚ÜíOperations) + Essential API Tests",
  "environment": "default",
  "timeout": 300,
  "retryCount": 1,
  "isActive": true
}

item.name: 1.2 Batch Create UI Tests (Steps 1-8) + 3 API Tests

exec: console.log('‚úÖ All UI + API Test Cases Created Successfully');

body.raw:
{
  "testCases": [
    {
      "name": "UI Step 0: User Registration (Signup)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "register",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/register.htm\", \"firstName\": \"John\", \"lastName\": \"Doe\", \"username\": \"testuser_ui\"}",
      "priority": "HIGH",
      "timeout": 60,
      "tags": "ui,register,screenshot,step0",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 0: User Login",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "login",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm\", \"username\": \"testuser\", \"password\": \"testpass\"}",
      "priority": "HIGH",
      "timeout": 60,
      "tags": "ui,login,screenshot,step0",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 1: Open Account (Authenticated)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "openaccount",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm\", \"accountType\": \"CHECKING\"}",
      "priority": "HIGH",
      "timeout": 90,
      "tags": "ui,openaccount,screenshot,step1",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 2: Account Overview (Authenticated)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "accountoverview",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/overview.htm\"}",
      "priority": "MEDIUM",
      "timeout": 90,
      "tags": "ui,overview,screenshot,step2",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 3: Transfer Funds (Authenticated)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "transferfunds",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/transfer.htm\", \"amount\": \"100\"}",
      "priority": "HIGH",
      "timeout": 90,
      "tags": "ui,transfer,screenshot,step3",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 4: Pay Bills (Authenticated)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "paybills",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/billpay.htm\", \"payeeName\": \"Electric Company\", \"amount\": \"75\"}",
      "priority": "HIGH",
      "timeout": 90,
      "tags": "ui,bills,screenshot,step4",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 5: Find Transactions (Authenticated)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "findtransactions",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/findtrans.htm\", \"transactionId\": \"12345\"}",
      "priority": "MEDIUM",
      "timeout": 90,
      "tags": "ui,transactions,screenshot,step5",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 6: Update Profile (Authenticated)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "updateprofile",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/updateprofile.htm\", \"firstName\": \"UpdatedJohn\"}",
      "priority": "MEDIUM",
      "timeout": 90,
      "tags": "ui,profile,screenshot,step6",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 7: Request Loan (Authenticated)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "requestloan",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/requestloan.htm\", \"amount\": \"5000\", \"downPayment\": \"1000\"}",
      "priority": "MEDIUM",
      "timeout": 90,
      "tags": "ui,loan,screenshot,step7",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "UI Step 8: Logout (Final Step)",
      "type": "UI",
      "functionality": "logout",
      "testData": "{\"pageUrl\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm\"}",
      "priority": "HIGH",
      "timeout": 60,
      "tags": "ui,logout,screenshot,step8",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "API 1: Login Authentication",
      "type": "API",
      "functionality": "login",
      "testData": "{\"endpoint\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/services/bank/login\", \"username\": \"testuser\", \"password\": \"testpass\"}",
      "priority": "HIGH",
      "timeout": 30,
      "tags": "api,login,essential",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "API 2: Create Customer",
      "type": "API",
      "functionality": "createcustomer",
      "testData": "{\"endpoint\": \"https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/services/bank/createCustomer\", \"firstName\": \"John\", \"lastName\": \"Doe\", \"username\": \"testuser_api\"}",
      "priority": "HIGH",
      "timeout": 30,
      "tags": "api,customer,essential",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "API 3: Health Check Validation",
      "type": "API",
      "functionality": "validateapi",
      "testData": "{\"endpoint\": \"https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1\"}",
      "priority": "MEDIUM",
      "timeout": 30,
      "tags": "api,validation,essential",
      "testSuiteId": "{{suiteId}}"
    }
  ]
}

item.name: Section 2: Execute Complete UI + API Suite
2.1 Execute UI Testing Suite + 3 API Tests
